person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Lara , who earned a stern rebuke from his own tour management after an angry outburst against Australia wicketkeeper Ian Healy , scored five to prolong a run of poor form with the bat .

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Person" entities in the paragraph:

1. Lara - a person (the subject of the sentence)
2. Ian Healy - a person (the recipient of Lara's angry outburst)

So, there are two "Person" entities in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

Of course! Here are the "Person" entities in the paragraph after removing the irrelevant entities:

1. Lara - a person (the subject of the sentence)
2. Ian Healy - a person (the recipient of Lara's angry outburst)

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any other questions.

| Ian Healy |
